LanguageData.BuildPDW.label: Build Uzi
LanguageData.BuildPDW.description: The Uzi is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power and high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildHeavySMG.label: Build Spectre M4 Luger
LanguageData.BuildHeavySMG.description: Builds a compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.\nCaliber: .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildTMPMachinePistol.label: Build Silenced TMP
LanguageData.BuildTMPMachinePistol.description: Builds a Silenced TMP (tactical machine pistol). Somewhat accurate at long range, has fast burstfire but low stopping power.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildSkorpionSMG.label: Build Scorpion EVO 3
LanguageData.BuildSkorpionSMG.description: Builds a Scorpion EVO 3, a machinepistol or light SMG with a notorious folding stock design. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at pistol range.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildM3SMG.label: Build M3 Greasegun
LanguageData.BuildM3SMG.description: Builds a M3 Greasegun, a very simplistic submachinegun design. Low damage, high fire rate and short range.\nCaliber: .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildVector.label: Build Kriss Vector K10
LanguageData.BuildVector.description: Builds a Kriss Vector K10, a submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximum range by a lot.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildMP5Gun.label: Build HK MP5A3
LanguageData.BuildMP5Gun.description: Builds a Heckler Koch Machine Pistol 5A3, a 9mm submachine gun of German design. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildUMP45Gun.label: Build HK UMP45
LanguageData.BuildUMP45Gun.description: The HK UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
